text:
Paris, France - Stupeflix [http://stupeflix.com]

We're looking for one front end and one back end engineer to join our team of five and help the world create awesome videos via our web app (available on Youtube.com/create) and our API (producing millions of videos a month). Come work on the GPU rendering engine, pixel-refine an advanced web app, and challenge us on Kinect. Send your Kinect Sports highest score to contact@stupeflix.com
